name.zh: 轻便拉链相机斜挎包（多颜色）

description.en: A compact camera-style crossbody bag with a structured silhouette and smooth zip closure. Ideal for phone, wallet, compact camera, and daily essentials. Great for commuting and travel. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), size, padding (optional), pocket layout, logo patch, lining, zippers (YKK optional) & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 相机包造型的小方包斜挎包，包型挺括，拉链开合顺畅。适合收纳手机、钱包、随身小物，也可作为轻便相机包使用，通勤旅行皆宜。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、可选加棉防护、口袋结构、Logo 工艺、内里、拉链（可选 YKK）与五金、包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Optional Padding: Foam/EVA padding for protection (customizable)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
肩带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：调节扣/挂钩/D 环等（可定制）
可选加棉：海绵/EVA 防护衬垫（可定制）

en.Use Case: Daily essentials, compact camera carry, travel organizer
en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, padding, pockets, logo, lining, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 18–24cm × 高 12–16cm × 深 6–10cm（可定制）
zh.适用场景: 日常随身/轻便相机包/旅行收纳
zh.颜色款式: 多 SKU 配色（见 variants）
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、加棉、防护结构、口袋、Logo、内里、拉链五金、包装
